content.text: Ms. PLASKETT. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Ms. PLASKETT

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 8 o'clock and 29 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until tomorrow, 
Tuesday, November 7, 2017, at 10 a.m. for morning-hour debate.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
